name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Developer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in building robust applications using **PHP**, **Node.js**, and **Laravel**. Proficient in database management with **SQL Server**, **MySQL**, **NoSQL**, **CosmosDB**, and **MongoDB**. Demonstrated expertise in cloud platforms including **Microsoft Azure** and **Amazon Web Services**. I have a solid understanding of containerization with **Docker** and proficient in CI/CD practices using **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**. 

Skilled in creating and managing **RESTful APIs** and capable of working within **SCRUM** and **Kanban** methodologies to deliver high-quality software solutions. My experience includes developing high-performance backend systems and integration with complex databases while adhering to best practices in software development and agile project management. A collaborative team player dedicated to continuous learning and adaptation in an evolving tech landscape.
